"use strict";(()=>{(self.webpackChunkapp=self.webpackChunkapp||[]).push([[1107],{51107:(R,u,s)=>{s.r(u),s.d(u,{HomePageSearchBar:()=>B});var c=s(31085),e=s(14041),h=s(58837),d=s(33986),v=s(45810),S=s.n(v),i=s(18690),m=s(87162),f=s(72814);const y=()=>{const t=(0,f.S)(m.rQ),a=(0,i.Zp)();return(0,e.useCallback)(({query:n})=>{const r=S().stringify({query:n},{addQueryPrefix:!0});a(`${t()}${r}`)},[a,t])},g=(0,h.A)({searchBarRoot:{fontSize:"1.5em"},searchBarOutline:{border:"1px solid #555",borderRadius:"6px"}}),B=t=>{const a=g(t),[n,r]=(0,e.useState)(""),o=(0,e.useRef)(null),l=y(),P=(0,e.useCallback)(()=>{l({query:o.current?.value??""})},[l]);return(0,c.jsx)(d.Z,{value:n,onSubmit:P,onChange:r,inputProps:{ref:o},InputProps:{...t.InputProps,classes:{root:a.searchBarRoot,notchedOutline:a.searchBarOutline,...t.InputProps?.classes}},...t})}}}]);})();
